criteria: Application of Criteria to Snack Choices
Consideration of Portion Size and Frequency
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the criteria for choosing a nutritious snack.
Identifies one basic criterion for choosing a nutritious snack, but with limited accuracy.
Identifies some criteria for choosing a nutritious snack, but lacks detail or has inaccuracies.
Identifies several criteria for choosing a nutritious snack with reasonable accuracy and detail.
Clearly identifies and explains most of the important criteria for choosing a nutritious snack with accuracy and detail.
Comprehensively identifies and explains all important criteria for choosing a nutritious snack with excellent accuracy, detail, and insight.
Unable to apply any nutritional criteria to snack choices.
Attempts to apply nutritional criteria to snack choices, but application is incorrect or irrelevant.
Applies some nutritional criteria to snack choices, but application is inconsistent or partially accurate.
Generally applies nutritional criteria appropriately to snack choices, with minor inconsistencies.
Consistently and accurately applies nutritional criteria to snack choices, providing clear justifications.
Masterfully applies nutritional criteria to snack choices, providing insightful justifications and demonstrating a deep understanding of nutritional impact.
Does not consider portion size or frequency when evaluating snack choices.
Mentions portion size or frequency, but does not integrate it into the evaluation of snack choices.
Briefly considers portion size or frequency, but lacks depth in the evaluation.
Adequately considers portion size and frequency when evaluating snack choices.
Clearly considers and explains the importance of portion size and frequency in making nutritious snack choices.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of how portion size and frequency impact the nutritional value of snack choices, providing nuanced insights.
